welcome_message_body: "Welcome to De Bilt, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and historic buildings. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our lovely city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport is exclusively for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal is used for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal is used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
